QuestData.Title: A Reason to Stay
QuestData.Description: <You find a pocketwatch on the ground. It is dirty, but still works. It was taken care of well.$b$bPerhaps there are other objects that Goldfield wasn't able to grab before he had to hole up in his house. He might appreciate it if you brought them to him.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Goldfield Farmstead for additional keepsakes.
QuestData.CompletionText: For the last time, I'm not leaving! I was here first, THEY can leave!
